1.content: Your world was pitch black for what had seemed only a few seconds then a blinding light hurts your eyes you are by instinct as most if not all baby's do you start to cry
1.title: Birth

choices: Leave and explore on your own [Time Skip]
Go to camp training with others like you
11.content:
You began to fell tracks pull onto you and assist you out of your mother's womb you was covered in thick feminine slime from track to commander hatch and your view finders/eyes where covered to... afther a few more seconds you began to fell a thick rug like flesh rub against you it was your father's toung that started to lick you clean of the feminine juices that leaked off of you

Afther a while you began to calm down as you was softhly pressed between your mother and fathers frontal plates that had softened to comfort you afther a few years you finnaly decided to
11.title: Youth

info.brief_description: You are in a world of living tanks and you can choose your path in 1941
info.description: You begin to wake up your world was pitch black and then suddenly became pure blinding white what where you...
